doc.abstracts: This issue of the international center for settlement of investment disputes (ICSID) caseload - statistics updates the profile of the ICSID caseload, historically and for the fiscal year 2015. It is based on cases registered or administered by ICSID as of June 30, 2015. This document illustrates: new cases Registered by ICSID in FY2015; annulment proceedings under the ICSID convention – outcomes; basis of consent invoked to establish ICSID Jurisdiction in registered ICSID cases; geographic distribution of all ICSID cases, by state party involved; distribution of new ICSID cases registered in FY2015, by economic sector; and arbitrators, conciliators and ad hoc committee members appointed in ICSID cases in FY2015.
